Borderless 2021
  • Program

Diversity of Academic and Industrial Careers across Continents

Virtually during IJCAI 2021!

The event brings together researchers from diverse cultural and professional backgrounds to share their experiences in building academic or industrial careers. The goal is to expand the knowledge of the participants of opportunities and challenges in various countries, rather than to provide general advice. The idea stems from the discussion during IJCAI-20, where being poorly informed about cross-border differences appeared to be a common roadblock on oneâ€™s career path.

Invited Hosts
Maria Garcia De La Banda Monash University Australia UTC+10
Georgiana Ifrim Insight SFI Research Centre UK UTC+1

Maria Keet University of Cape Town South Africa UTC+2
